content: add a modern flair to a cherished favorite this circle to square granny square is a fresh take on the classic granny square this pattern features a photo tutorial as well as a link to a video tutorial instructing how to make the circle granny square please note that both the video and photo tutorials do not include instruction for assembly assembly instructions are included in this pattern in written format only suggested yarn big twist value yarn 5 skeins in white and 1 skein in each of the remaining colors gold teal soft gray blush pink and medium rose finished measurements size throw / lap wrap approximately 36 in x 66 in each square measures 5 5 in x 5 5 in pattern is written in standard us terms pattern can be viewed on my blog for free here square https //justbcrafty com/circle-to-square-granny-square-tutorial/ joining and layout https //justbcrafty com/2017/0 4/circle-to-square-granny-square-blanket-tutorial html
